version_description:
It’s summer time! Check out our new live wallpapers!

We also made performance and stability improvements as well as some minor UI enhancements that will definitely enhance your experience with our app.

Please, leave us feedback and feel free to suggest us your ideas and concerns.
Best to you!

It’s all about performance! Live Wallpapers now FASTER than ever!

Don’t forget to try our new pixel’s wallpapers as well!

We also made some other stability improvements and minor UI enhancements that will definitely enhance your experience with our app.

Please, leave us feedback and feel free to suggest us your ideas and concerns.

Best to you!

- Fixed the error, that offered a weekly subscription, when you choose monthly or yearly plan;
- Fixed bugs;
- Small improvements.
We thank all of you for using Everpix. We are working for you! We would like to give special thanks to users, who tell us about problems in the app and gives us ideas to improve Everpix!
Please rate this version on the App Store, we really need it!
We’re gladly waiting for your reviews and offers!

We’ve fixed some problems and improved the user experience.
We always aim to make Everpix Live Wallpapers better, than now, that’s why we make changes and improvements often. We’re glad to hear your reviews and feedback!

Different top charts for premium and free live wallpapers;
Less advertisement.

We thank all of you for using Everpix. We re working for you! We would like to give special thanks to users, who tell us about problems in the app and gives us ideas to improve Everpix!

Don’t forget to rate us on the App Store, we really need it!
We’re gladly waiting for your reviews and offers!

- Secret wallpapers
Note: Premium users don't see "Secret wallpapers" because all live wallpapers are unlocked!

Check now!

It’s summer time! Check out our new live wallpapers!

We also made performance and stability improvements as well as some minor UI enhancements that will definitely enhance your experience with our app.

Please, leave us feedback and feel free to suggest us your ideas and concerns.
Best to you!

It’s all about performance! Live Wallpapers now FASTER than ever!

Don’t forget to try our new pixel’s wallpapers as well!

We also made some other stability improvements and minor UI enhancements that will definitely enhance your experience with our app.

Please, leave us feedback and feel free to suggest us your ideas and concerns.

Best to you!

- Everpix Live supports iOS 13 and Dark Mode now. To use these feature just enable Dark Mode in the System settings.
- A special pack of various colours live wallpapers to match the style of new iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro and iPhone 11 Pro Max.
- Perfect compatibility with new iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro and iPhone 11 Pro Max
- Supports iPhone XR (with iOS 13)

- Everpix Live supports iOS 13 and Dark Mode now. To use these feature just enable Dark Mode in the System settings.
- A special pack of various colours live wallpapers to match the style of new iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro and iPhone 11 Pro Max.
- Perfect compatibility with new iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro and iPhone 11 Pro Max.
- Supports iPhone XR (with iOS 13).

- Everpix Live supports iOS 13 and Dark Mode now. To use these feature just enable Dark Mode in the System settings.
- A special pack of various colours live wallpapers to match the style of new iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro and iPhone 11 Pro Max.
- Perfect compatibility with new iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro and iPhone 11 Pro Max.
- Supports iPhone XR (with iOS 13).

Everpix Live wish you Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!
We also made some performance improvements to make your experience with live wallpapers better than ever!

We made some performance improvements to make your experience with live wallpapers better than ever!

- Now even more wallpapers in 4K resolution. Enjoy quality live wallpapers!
- The app works a little faster than previous version.

Thank you so much for your continued support!
Don't forget to share your feedback with us via everpixapp@gmail.com

- Added more breathtaking live wallpapers in 4K;
- Performance and stability improvements.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback! We're committed to making the app even better. Share your impressions with us via everpixapp@gmail.com

In the new version:
- Improved download speed;
- Added exclusive content;
- Added more 4K wallpapers;
- Fixed bugs.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback! We're committed to making the app even better. Share your impressions with us via everpixapp@gmail.com

Live wallpapers are added more often since this version! 
We also made some performance improvements to make your experience with live wallpapers better than ever.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback! We're committed to making the app even better. Share your impressions with us via everpixapp@gmail.com

- Good news! The new version is optimized for iOS 14 and now works perfectly on new iPhone 12 Series;
- We've added some new amazing Christmas wallpapers for you to enjoy during this holiday season!

We value your opinion and strive to provide the best experience possible, so If you have any comments or feedback do not hesitate to contact us via everpixapp@gmail.com!

The new version has some performance improvements so that you can have a better experience with the app. Enjoy!
New content is being added constantly – you'll definitely find your perfect wallpaper in our diverse categories.

We love hearing from you! Send us your feedback and comments via everpixapp@gmail.com.
Also, check out our social media: @everpix_live on Instagram and @everpixlive on Facebook.

A new set of breathtaking wallpapers is on the way! In the new version we’ve fixed some bugs and made some stability improvements for a better user experience. Tell us what you think via everpixapp@gmail.com and don’t forget to check out our social media: @everpix_live on Instagram and @everpixlive on Facebook!

Get ready for new gorgeous live wallpapers! This version shows some performance improvements for a smoother app experience – try it out!

Tell us what you think via everpixapp@gmail.com and don’t forget to check out our social media: @everpix_live on Instagram and @everpixlive on Facebook!
